room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Escape Kings in Charlotte
review: My family and I did this escape room and had a blast. The staff was fun and friendly. The escape room was challenging but lot of fun. We made it out with just a little time to spare. Next time we are in town we will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Escape Kings in Charlotte
review: Went with a group of 8 and it was so much fun! We did the zombie room and it was awesome! Will definitely be back to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Escape Kings in Charlotte
review: Went with my husband and 2 boys and they loved it. I was a little worried that my 14-year-old won't be interested but he ended up having the most fun. We did the Outbreak and will be back to do another one soon.
